name: PHUX Governance Token
description: PHUX, also known as Pulse & Hex Universe Xchange, is a programmable liquidity protocol and decentralized automated market maker (AMM) built on PulseChain. PHUX serves as a versatile component for customizable liquidity solutions, providing a flexible building block for tailoring liquidity needs. It allows users to create Liquidity Pools, Indices, and Stable Swaps on PulseChain.
